attributes.action: Honor the vote given to the people of the UK, we voted to leave the EU no deals
attributes.additional_details: WE the people only ever agreed, AFTER the fact, to joining EEC for trade purposes. We were LIED to by OMMISION as to the future aims evolving into EU and then Federal States of Europe. We now know that Edward Heath knowingly signed away OUR sovereignty which was also an act of treason! Furthermore ALL successive governments have KNOWINGLY signed away treaties in the name of OUR COUNTRY and been rewarded by EU at the cost of OUR future sovereign freedom.
attributes.background: ALL successive governments have KNOWINGLY signed away treaties in the name of OUR COUNTRY and been rewarded by EU at the cost of OUR future sovereign freedom. We have had decades of “brainwashing power” of EU that we cannot trade on our own. UK has effectively been TAKEN OVER ,
